tool_description: Creates custom prayer entries with user-defined content, duration, and scheduling preferences.

prayer_name.description: Name for the custom prayer or meditation

prayer_content.description: Text content or description of the prayer/meditation

prayer_tags.description: Tags for categorization (gratitude, healing, guidance, etc.)

preferred_time.description: Preferred time of day: morning, afternoon, evening, night, any

repetition_pattern.description: How often to include: daily, weekly, monthly, as_needed

error_messages: Invalid duration: Duration must be between 1 and 120 minutes
Empty prayer content: Prayer content cannot be empty
Invalid preferred time: Use one of [morning, afternoon, evening, night, any]
Invalid repetition pattern: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, as_needed]
Prayer name too long: Prayer name must be under 50 characters
usage: Provide prayer name, content, and duration. Optionally add tags, timing preferences, repetition pattern, music suggestions, and preparation notes. Returns a structured custom prayer entry.

prayer_id.description: Unique identifier for the custom prayer

prayer_name.description: Name of the created custom prayer

creation_timestamp.description: When the custom prayer was created
